Córdoba

Spanish Language Schools in Córdoba

Everything you need to know about spanish language schools as an expat in Córdoba. Locations, tips, costs, and local insights.

Overview

Language schools, tutors, and immersion programs for learning Spanish.

Group classes, private lessons, and immersion programs available. Prices significantly lower than US/Europe. Argentine Spanish (voseo) is distinct.

Specific to Córdoba:

  • • Córdoba has fewer language schools but often with more personalized attention and lower prices.

Recommended Providers

Expanish

Palermo

Popular with expats, intensive programs

Vamos Spanish Academy

San Telmo

Small groups, relaxed atmosphere

InterBA

Belgrano

Flexible programs

Academia Buenos Aires

Established school

Tips for Expats

  • Intensive courses (20hrs/week) best for rapid learning
  • Group classes more affordable and social
  • Private tutors $10-20 USD/hour
  • Learn 'voseo' (Argentine 'vos' form)
  • Combine classes with language exchanges

Costs

Group classes: $150-300 USD/week | Private: $15-25 USD/hour

Documents Needed

  • Passport (for enrollment)

Frequently Asked Questions

How long to become conversational?

With intensive study (20hrs/week), most reach conversational level in 3-6 months. Full fluency takes 1-2 years.

Is Argentine Spanish different?

Yes, Argentines use 'vos' instead of 'tú', have distinct pronunciation (ll/y sounds like 'sh'), and unique vocabulary. You'll be understood throughout Latin America.
